infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: DOTO needs your location to show nearby tasks and help you find opportunities to help others in your community.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: DOTO needs access to your photos to let you upload images for posts and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: DOTO needs camera access to let you take photos for posts.

plugins.photosPermission: DOTO needs access to your photos to let you upload images for posts and profile pictures.
plugins.cameraPermission: DOTO needs camera access to let you take photos for posts.
